properties.title: Luxury Villa in Colombo 7
properties.description: Beautiful luxury villa with modern amenities
properties.longDescription: Myla Villa - Colombo 7 is a luxurious urban retreat blending modern design with traditional Sri Lankan elements. Located in the prestigious Colombo 7 area, it offers a tranquil haven with stunning views of the city and lush greenery. The villa features four air-conditioned bedrooms with ocean-view balconies, spacious living areas, a private infinity pool, a games room, a media room, and a fully equipped kitchen. Key amenities include free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, a stereo system, and a book library. The villa provides personalized services like a private chef, villa manager, housekeepers, butlers, and 24/7 security. Guests can also enjoy airport transfers, spa services, and groceries at cost. Itâ€™s the perfect blend of urban luxury, comfort, and Sri Lankan hospitality, ideal for both relaxation and city exploration.
